thread.title: Customer Julie Betts
thread.title_full: eSpares.co.uk reviewed by Customer Julie Betts

author: Customer Julie Betts
title: Customer Julie Betts
text: I have used the Espares washing machine & dishwasher sachets before! I don't have a dishwasher so I bought the cleaner sachets for my washing machine! I find they are very good at removing scale build up & disinfecting my washing machine! at the same time! As the sachets were on offer they were very good value for money too! I would recommend them as I have been very satisfied with them hence the reason I ordered them again! Plus, once you have placed your order they arrive within days!
